name: Probe Life
description:
Just playing with emergent behavior hovering and flight.
Used a Protoss Probe model just to have something interesting to look at, and made its little antennas and what not move around like they are controlling the movement. (top one folds down with speed), and core glow is based on overall thrust.

happy flying.

There is no goal or anything to do but fly around right now.  Very much open to suggestion as to tasks to do and activities.  let me know in comments if you wanna see something.

Controls setup for using an XBox one controller.

Protoss Probe by ekngo92 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
